description: This file defines the S3KnowledgeBase class, which manages interactions with AWS S3 buckets and objects, providing methods to retrieve S3 objects and handle related configurations.

classes.name: S3KnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages access to S3 buckets and objects, providing properties to retrieve documents and objects from S3.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Property intended to return a list of document lists, not implemented in this class.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous property intended to return a list of document lists, not implemented in this class.

methods.name: s3_objects
methods.description: Property that retrieves S3 objects based on the current configuration, handling various cases of bucket, object, key, and prefix.
